import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar } from "semantic-ui-react"; import "./Header.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Items from "../../scenes/item"; export default class SidebarExampleSidebar extends Component { state = { visible: false }; handleSidebarHide = () => this.setState({ visible: false }); handleSidebarToggle = () => this.setState(prevState => ({ visible: !prevState.visible })); render() { const { visible } = this.state; return (

); } }
